author: Notimerica
title: El segundo abril más cálido mantiene temperaturas subiendo más de 1,5º
text: MADRID, 8 May. (EUROPA PRESS) - Abril de 2025 fue el segundo abril más cálido a nivel mundial, con una temperatura superficial del aire promedio de 14,96° Celsius, 0,60 °C por encima de la media de abril de 1991-2020. Así lo establece el último boletín mensual publicado por el Servicio de Cambio Climático de Copernicus (C3S), implementado por el Centro Europeo de Previsiones Meteorológicas a Plazo Medio. El pasado mes fue 0,07 °C más frío que el abril récord de 2024 y 0,07 °C más cálido que el tercer abril más cálido de 2016. Superó en 1,51 °C el promedio estimado para el período 1850-1900 utilizado para definir el nivel preindustrial y fue el vigésimo primer mes de los últimos 22 meses en el que la temperatura media global del aire en superficie superó en más de 1,5 °C el nivel preindustrial. El período de 12 meses de mayo de 2024 a abril de 2025 superó en 0,70 °C el promedio del período 1991-2020 y en 1,58 °C el nivel preindustrial. La temperatura media en Europa continental en abril de 2025 fue de 9,38 °C, 1,01 °C por encima de la media de abril de 1991-2020, lo que lo convierte en el sexto abril más cálido de Europa. Las temperaturas fueron predominantemente superiores a la media en toda Europa, registrándose las mayores anomalías cálidas en Europa oriental, el oeste de Rusia, Kazajistán y Noruega, mientras que las temperaturas más frías que la media se registraron en Turquía, zonas orientales de Bulgaria y Rumanía, la península de Crimea y el norte de Fenoscandia. Fuera de Europa, las temperaturas más altas fueron en el Lejano Oriente ruso y en gran parte del centro-oeste de Asia. También fueron superiores a la media en la mayor parte de América del Norte, parte de Australia, la península Antártica y la Antártida Occidental. Las temperaturas más bajas fueron en el sur de Sudamérica, en el este de Canadá, en la región de los Grandes Lagos, en la bahía de Hudson, en el noreste de Groenlandia y Svalbard, y en el norte de Australia y la Antártida Oriental. La temperatura superficial del mar promedio de abril de 2025, entre 60°S y 60°N (latitudes medias), fue de 20,89 °C, el segundo valor más alto registrado para el mes, 0,15 °C por debajo del récord de abril de 2024. Estas temperaturas se mantuvieron inusualmente altas en muchas cuencas oceánicas y mares. Entre ellos, extensas áreas del noreste del Atlántico Norte continuaron mostrando récords para el mes. La mayor parte del mar Mediterráneo fue mucho más cálida que el promedio, pero no tan alta como en marzo.

organizations.name: Servicio de Cambio Climático de Copernicus

author: BOA FORMA
title: Priscilla Alcântara mostra barriga trincada após rotina intensa de treinos
text:
Priscilla Alcântara mostra barriga trincada após rotina intensa de treinos
Cantora revelou que também realiza treinos em casa e compartilhou uma sugestão ao lado da personal trainer Carol Borba
Treinando firme há pouco mais de dois anos, Priscilla Ancântara tem usado seu perfil no Instagram para mostrar os resultados de sua rotina intensa de exercícios e alimentação saudável: um corpo para lá de definido, com direito a barriga tanquinho.
Recentemente, a cantora voltou a compartilhar um clique de seu novo corpo na rede social, arrancando diversos elogios dos internautas nos comentários da publicação. “Um abdômen é um abdômen”, disse um fã. “Gente, e esse abdômen?”, se surpreendeu outro.
Treino de Priscilla Alcântara em casa
Priscilla não treina apenas na academia, mas também realiza alguns exercícios em sua própria casa. Para isso, ela acompanha os vídeos de Carol Borba, treinadora física, influencer e criadora da plataforma “Treinos Power, por Carol Borba”, como também já compartilhou em seu perfil do Instagram.
Assim, diante de diversos pedidos dos internautas para compartilhar sua rotina de treinos, a cantora decidiu criar um conteúdo em parceria com a profissional de educação física para mostrar um pouco de sua rotina de treinos em casa.
“Surpresa! Eu simplesmente trouxe Carol Borba para treinar comigo e passar um treininho para vocês, que me pedem tanto! Eu não era doida de compartilhar qualquer conteúdo com vocês, então já ‘lancei’ a diva logo de cara”, escreveu na legenda do post.
Abaixo, você confere o vídeo da dupla para se inspirar e malhar sem sair de casa!

author: T13
title: Nieta de chileno entrega duro testimonio a un año de ser secuestrada por Hamás: “De tanto dolor me desmayé”
text: Mia Schem, nieta del chileno Zeev Scharf, que fue secuestrada por Hamás cuando se encontraba en un festival de música electrónica en 2023. La joven que en ese entonces tenía 21 años concedió una entrevista a “Connected: Life in War”, donde se refirió a los más de 50 días en los que estuvo en cautiverio. En un adelanto compartido por la Embajada de Israel en Chile, se escucha parte del relato de Mia Schem: “Simplemente me amarraron el brazo. Me amarraron el brazo a un plástico, me lo amarraron fuerte y lo tenía así, pegado, por tres días”. “Llegué a la casa de mi secuestrador y estaba en el último día de mi periodo (menstrual). Y su esposa, me tenía que sujetar el brazo para que yo pueda caminar. Literalmente tuvieron que sujetar el trozo de plástico (que sujetaba el brazo)”, explicó la nieta del chileno. [ Lee También ](/noticia/mundo/habla-gisele-pelicot-victima-violacion-durante-10-anos-por-su-esposo-quien-invi-23-10-2024) Gisèle Pelicot en juicio por violación: "La vergüenza, no somos nosotras la que tenemos que tenerla, son ellos" En su relato Mia Schem reveló que la esposa del secuestrador era quien sujetaba su brazo, ya que la acompañó al baño. “Yo nunca podré olvidar eso y con un brazo así y llorando. Mis lágrimas simplemente fluían, y yo intenté ponerme un tampón, pero no pude. Yo lloraba y no podía”. “Él (el secuestrador) estaba afuera golpeando la puerta y su esposa me gritaba. De tanto dolor yo simplemente recuerdo que me desmayé, sin ropa interior, sin pantalones”, reveló Schem. Según la nieta del chileno, “él (secuestrador) todo el tiempo me recordaba que me vio sin ropa interior. Durante todo el tiempo allí, no tuve mi periodo por el estado de shock, el trauma del cuerpo. Pero allí (en Gaza) tú ya no sabes qué pensar”. [Síguenos en](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiEOgjh55R1O_OHSPw0T00iXYqFAgKIhDoI4eeUdTvzh0j8NE9NIl2)

author: Billy
title: Boeing union members strike for first time in 16 years after rejecting contract
text: Thirty-three thousand union members at [Boeing](https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/tag/boeing/) walked off the job Friday after they overwhelmingly rejected a four-year contract. Leadership at the International Association of Machinists union had described the [rejected deal](https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/news/business/3147086/boeing-and-union-reach-tentative-deal-avoid-labor-strike/) as one of the “best” it’s ever negotiated with Boeing, saying it would have given raises of at least 25% over four years. The union also said it would increase job security for [union members](https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/tag/unions) because Boeing promised to build its next commercial jet, which has not yet been announced, at a unionized factory. Still, 95% of IAM union members voted against the deal, and 96% voted to authorize a strike, according to [CNN](https://www.cnn.com/2024/09/13/business/strike-boeing-vote-iam-751-hnk-intl/index.html). The strike began at 2:59 a.m. on Friday, the first strike the company has faced since 2008, which lasted about 50 days. “This is about fighting for our future,” Jon Holden, president of the largest IAM local chapter, said as he announced the vote results. “We will be back at the table whenever we can get there to drive forward on the issues our members say are important.” Boeing employs 150,000 people across the country, with around half of them in Washington state. This strike covers about a fifth of the company’s employees. One estimate said this strike could cost Boeing at least $3 billion if it lasts as long as the one in 2008, [according](https://www.nytimes.com/2024/09/13/business/boeing-strike-workers-explained.html) to an estimate from Cai von Rumohr, a research analyst at the investment bank TD Cowen. The company said it is looking to return to the negotiating table. “The message was clear that the tentative agreement we reached with IAM leadership was not acceptable to the members,” Boeing said in a statement. “We remain committed to resetting our relationship with our employees and the union.” Kelly Ortberg, Boeing’s new CEO, said union members had been upset over past contract terms but that he wished for them to think past those and vote in favor of the deal. The union members still remember, however, the loss of pension benefits 10 years ago, which they want back, but Boeing did not offer it during the negotiations. “I know the reaction to our tentative agreement with the IAM has been passionate,” Ortberg wrote to employees. “I understand and respect that passion, but I ask you not to sacrifice the opportunity to secure our future together, because of the frustrations of the past.” In recent years, Boeing has struggled with a slew of mishaps and fatal plane crashes that have put the company in the hot seat since at least 2018. [Two of ](https://www.cnn.com/2019/03/10/africa/ethiopian-airlines-crash-boeing-max-8-intl/index.html)its 737 Max planes fatally crashed, one in October 2018 and another in March 2019, killing 346 people and leading to a [20-month grounding](https://www.cnn.com/2019/03/13/politics/donald-trump-boeing-faa/index.html) of Boeing’s bestselling plane. [CLICK HERE TO READ MORE FROM THE WASHINGTON EXAMINER](http://washingtonexaminer.com/) Earlier this year, a door plug blew out a 737 Max operated by Alaska Airlines shortly after takeoff. While no one was seriously injured in that incident, it put the company back in the spotlight. The investigation into that incident revealed the plane had left a Boeing factory without the four bolts needed to hold the door plug in place. [Eight Boeing aircraft](https://www.nytimes.com/2024/03/18/travel/united-airlines-boeing-airplane-safety.html) flown by United Airlines were also diverted or required an emergency landing shortly after takeoff this spring due to mechanical problems.

author: Pablo Javier Piacente
title: La IA ya está ocupando puestos de trabajo: chatbots y profesionales freelance
text:
Tecnología y sociedad
La IA ya está ocupando puestos de trabajo: chatbots y profesionales freelance
Los chatbots han reducido en un 21% la demanda de profesionales freelance, sobretodo en tareas más rutinarias que creativas
Pablo Javier Piacente
Desde el auge de la Inteligencia Artificial (IA), y más aún luego de la popularización de ChatGPT y otras aplicaciones de chatbot, la demanda de algunas especialidades laborales relacionadas con la creación de contenidos, la programación o la entrada de datos ha sufrido un importante descenso, según un nuevo estudio. Los resultados confirman que se requerirá una combinación de nuevas estrategias profesionales por parte de los trabajadores y de iniciativas de seguridad social encaradas por estados y organizaciones civiles para reducir el impacto de los cambios.
Un equipo de científicos de la Universidad de Harvard, en Estados Unidos, el Instituto Alemán de Investigación Económica y el Imperial College de Londres, en el Reino Unido, estudiaron casi un millón y medio de puestos de trabajo solicitados en un importante portal de profesionales independientes a nivel global, desde julio de 2021 hasta julio de 2023, y revelaron que la demanda de las posiciones freelance propensas a la automatización cayó un 21%, solamente ocho meses después del lanzamiento de ChatGPT, a fines de 2022.
El documento, publicado en OpenRead y SSRN, analiza el impacto de las tecnologías de Inteligencia Artificial (IA) en la demanda de trabajadores independientes online utilizando un gran conjunto de datos de una plataforma líder, cuyo nombre no fue revelado. Los científicos identificaron los tipos de trabajos que se ven más afectados por la IA generativa y cuantificaron la magnitud del impacto en ese mercado laboral específico.
Un fuerte impacto
Los hallazgos muestran una disminución del 21% en el número de puestos de trabajo con posibilidad de ser automatizados mediante la [IA](https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/09/30/confirmado-ia-cambiando-inteligencia-colectiva-108740473.html), principalmente en las tareas de carácter más rutinario ligadas a la creación y redacción de contenidos, la codificación y programación, el diseño y el ingreso de datos, entre otras especialidades.
Analizando en concreto algunos detalles, observaron que la introducción de tecnologías de [IA](https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/09/16/ia-cambiar-opinion-creyentes-fervorosos-108219108.html) para la generación de imágenes condujo a una disminución significativa del 17% en el número de puestos de trabajo relacionados con la producción visual para proyectos digitales. A través de la herramienta Google Trends, pudieron demostrar que la disminución más pronunciada en la demanda de profesionales freelance dentro de los secores indicados se relaciona directamente con el crecimiento de la popularidad y el concimiento de las potencialidades de ChatGPT y otros sistemas similares.
Desafíos y nuevas oportunidades al mismo tiempo
Según un [artículo](https://www.fastcompany.com/91229781/ai-is-already-taking-jobs-research-shows-routine-tasks-are-the-first-to-go) publicado en Fast Company, los especialistas sostienen que los responsables de políticas públicas y directores de organizaciones sociales deberán promover el acceso equitativo a oportunidades de educación y capacitación, apoyar a los trabajadores desplazados a través de redes de seguridad social y llevar adelante programas de reempleo, entre otras posibles medidas.
Por último, TechRadar [informa](https://www.techradar.com/pro/chatgpt-has-caused-a-massive-drop-in-demand-for-online-digital-freelancers-here-is-what-you-can-do-to-protect-yourself) que los investigadores subrayaron en el estudio que aunque el mercado laboral parece sombrío para algunas especialidades, al mismo tiempo surgirán nuevas profesiones, como ya ha sucedido durante cambios tecnológicos previos. Al mismo tiempo, muchos profesionales lograrán adaptar sus habilidades al nuevo entorno y mantendrán sus empleos, saliendo incluso fortalecidos al volcarse a tareas más creativas o analíticas, que la IA aún no logra dominar.
Referencia
[Who is AI Replacing? The Impact of ChatGPT on Online Freelancing Platforms](https://www.openread.academy/en/paper/reading?corpusId=265008695). Ozge Demirci, Jonas Hannane and Xinrong Zhu. OpenRead / SSRN (2024). DOI:https://doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.4602944

author: Eleutheria5
title: Jordanian man causes $700,000 in damages to solar panels, businesses over Israel support
text:
A Jordanian man living in Florida has been arrested for causing hundreds of thousands of dollars of damage to a solar energy facility and damaging multiple businesses over their perceived support for Israel, the U.S. Attorney's Office of the Middle District of Florida announced on Thursday.
Hashem Younis Hashem Hnaihen, 43, is accused of breaking the front doors of multiple businesses in a rampage in June. He wore a mask while committing the vandalism and left behind warning letters stating his intention to “destroy or explode everything here in whole America. Especially the companies and factories that support the racist state of Israel.”
In late June, Hnaihen broke into a solar energy facility in Wedgefield, Florida, where he worked for hours to smash the facility's solar panels, causing an estimated $700,000 in damages. He also cut wires and damaged critical electrical equipment.
The FBI became involved in the investigation, and Hnaihen was arrested on July 11 and indicted by a grand jury last week. He is charged with four counts of threatening to use explosives and one count of destruction of an energy facility, and faces up to 60 years in prison if convicted, 10 years for each threat and 20 years for the sabotage...

organizations.name: u.s. attorney's office of the middle district of florida

author: yahoo
title: PZ Cussons plc's (LON:PZC) Intrinsic Value Is Potentially 26% Above Its Share Price
text:
Simply Wall St. PZ Cussons plc's (LON:PZC) Intrinsic Value Is Potentially 26% Above Its Share Price Read full article editorial-team@simplywallst.com (Simply Wall St) December 29, 2023 at 10:24 AM · 6 min read Key Insights
PZ Cussons' estimated fair value is UK£1.92 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity
PZ Cussons' UK£1.52 share price signals that it might be 21% undervalued
The UK£2.03 analyst price target for PZC is 5.7% more than our estimate of fair value
How far off is PZ Cussons plc (LON:PZC) from its intrinsic value? Using the most recent financial data, we'll take a look at whether the stock is fairly priced by taking the expected future cash flows and discounting them to today's value. One way to achieve this is by employing the Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) model. There's really not all that much to it, even though it might appear quite complex.
Remember though, that there are many ways to estimate a company's value, and a DCF is just one method. For those who are keen learners of equity analysis, the Simply Wall St analysis model here may be something of interest to you.
See our latest analysis for PZ Cussons
What's The Estimated Valuation? We use what is known as a 2-stage model, which simply means we have two different periods of growth rates for the company's cash flows. Generally the first stage is higher growth, and the second stage is a lower growth phase. To start off with, we need to estimate the next ten years of cash flows. Where possible we use analyst estimates, but when these aren't available we extrapolate the previous free cash flow (FCF) from the last estimate or reported value. We assume companies with shrinking free cash flow will slow their rate of shrinkage, and that companies with growing free cash flow will see their growth rate slow, over this period. We do this to reflect that growth tends to slow more in the early years than it does in later years.
A DCF is all about the idea that a dollar in the future is less valuable than a dollar today, so we need to discount the sum of these future cash flows to arrive at a present value estimate:
10-year free cash flow (FCF) estimate 2024

("Est" = FCF growth rate estimated by Simply Wall St)
Present Value of 10-year Cash Flow (PVCF) = UK£387m
Story continues We now need to calculate the Terminal Value, which accounts for all the future cash flows after this ten year period. For a number of reasons a very conservative growth rate is used that cannot exceed that of a country's GDP growth. In this case we have used the 5-year average of the 10-year government bond yield (1.5%) to estimate future growth. In the same way as with the 10-year 'growth' period, we discount future cash flows to today's value, using a cost of equity of 8.9%.
Terminal Value (TV) = FCF 2033 × (1 + g) ÷ (r – g) = UK£72m× (1 + 1.5%) ÷ (8.9%– 1.5%) = UK£984m
Present Value of Terminal Value (PVTV) = TV / (1 + r) 10 = UK£984m÷ ( 1 + 8.9%) 10 = UK£418m
The total value is the sum of cash flows for the next ten years plus the discounted terminal value, which results in the Total Equity Value, which in this case is UK£804m. The last step is to then divide the equity value by the number of shares outstanding. Compared to the current share price of UK£1.5, the company appears a touch undervalued at a 21% discount to where the stock price trades currently. Valuations are imprecise instruments though, rather like a telescope - move a few degrees and end up in a different galaxy. Do keep this in mind.
LSE:PZC Discounted Cash Flow December 29th 2023 The Assumptions We would point out that the most important inputs to a discounted cash flow are the discount rate and of course the actual cash flows. If you don't agree with these result, have a go at the calculation yourself and play with the assumptions. The DCF also does not consider the possible cyclicality of an industry, or a company's future capital requirements, so it does not give a full picture of a company's potential performance. Given that we are looking at PZ Cussons as potential shareholders, the cost of equity is used as the discount rate, rather than the cost of capital (or weighted average cost of capital, WACC) which accounts for debt. In this calculation we've used 8.9%, which is based on a levered beta of 1.257. Beta is a measure of a stock's volatility, compared to the market as a whole. We get our beta from the industry average beta of globally comparable companies, with an imposed limit between 0.8 and 2.0, which is a reasonable range for a stable business.
SWOT Analysis for PZ Cussons Strength
Debt is well covered by earnings.
Dividends are covered by earnings and cash flows.
Weakness
Earnings declined over the past year.
Dividend is low compared to the top 25% of dividend payers in the Personal Products market.
Opportunity
Annual earnings are forecast to grow for the next 3 years.
Trading below our estimate of fair value by more than 20%.
Threat
Debt is not well covered by operating cash flow.
Annual earnings are forecast to grow slower than the British market.
Looking Ahead: Valuation is only one side of the coin in terms of building your investment thesis, and it shouldn't be the only metric you look at when researching a company. The DCF model is not a perfect stock valuation tool. Instead the best use for a DCF model is to test certain assumptions and theories to see if they would lead to the company being undervalued or overvalued. For example, changes in the company's cost of equity or the risk free rate can significantly impact the valuation. Why is the intrinsic value higher than the current share price? For PZ Cussons, we've compiled three additional aspects you should further research:
Risks : Be aware that PZ Cussons is showing 2 warning signs in our investment analysis , you should know about...
Future Earnings : How does PZC's growth rate compare to its peers and the wider market? Dig deeper into the analyst consensus number for the upcoming years by interacting with our free analyst growth expectation chart.
Other High Quality Alternatives : Do you like a good all-rounder? Explore our interactive list of high quality stocks to get an idea of what else is out there you may be missing!
PS. Simply Wall St updates its DCF calculation for every British stock every day, so if you want to find the intrinsic value of any other stock just search here .
Have feedback on this article? Concerned about the content? Get in touch with us directly. Alternatively, email editorial-team (at) simplywallst.com.
